channel.title: Comments on: This Week in Genesis (18 Sep 2015)
channel.description: The best new WordPress Genesis things

item.title: By: Nick Davis
item.dc:creator: Nick Davis
item.description:
In reply to <a href="https://genesiswp.guide/2015-09-18/#comment-103">Carleigh</a>.
Hey Carleigh, you're very welcome, glad you're enjoying the round-ups!
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Carleigh.

Hey Carleigh, you’re very welcome, glad you’re enjoying the round-ups!

item.title: By: Carleigh
item.dc:creator: Carleigh
item.description: Thanks for the mention! I always look forward to your weekly round up.
item.content:encoded: Thanks for the mention! I always look forward to your weekly round up.

item.title: By: Len
item.dc:creator: Len
item.description:
Thanks for the mention Nick. Looking forward to the launch of your theme.
Also, it's nice seeing a weeks worth of Genesis activity in one place. :)
item.content:encoded:
